description: This file defines a React functional component named Sidebar that manages the display and behavior of a navigation sidebar in a web application. It includes import statements, state management with useState and useEffect hooks, and JSX for rendering UI elements such as logo, navigation items, and footer. It dynamically adjusts layout based on window size and user profile data.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Main React component for rendering the sidebar with collapsible behavior based on window size and user profile.
